test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of the auth controller, covering scenarios including successful login, invalid credentials, missing username or password, invalid JSON input, and authentication service exceptions.
The tests verify the login functionality of the account lock controller, covering scenarios of successful login, login with invalid credentials, and various cases of missing or improper login data.
The tests verify the account lockout controller's login functionality, covering scenarios of successful authentication, invalid credentials, account lockout, and missing data in login requests.
